channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets
channel.desc: The most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
channel.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
channel.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: The Close
channel.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell; a synthesis of the top stories; key insights from investors, strategists and the companies of today and tomorrow.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
channel.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Bloomberg Primer
channel.desc: Scientists are developing more powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion; China's dominance of the supply chain for rare earth magnets threatens their global availability.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Bloomberg Primer: Can Living Human Brain Cells Power AI?
channel.desc: Exploring the world of biocomputing, where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
channel.desc: Bringing global investors everything you need to know as the trading day begins in Asia. Bloomberg TV is live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
channel.desc: Financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with his peers who leaders of some of America's biggest companies.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Bloomberg Power Players
channel.desc: Bloomberg Power Players in New York brings together influential voices from the business of sports to identify the next wave of disruption that could hit this multi-trillion dollar global industry.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: The China Show
channel.desc: From politics and policy to tech and trends, Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors insight into the world's second-biggest economy, delivering in-depth discussions with newsmakers.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Insight with Haslinda Amin
channel.desc: In a volatile and unpredictable world, the show will be the definitive guide for the global news audience to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day. With news making executives, officials and thought-leaders from the world of business, politics and academia we will explore a story through probing interviews and nuanced conversations. The hour of programming will also highlight the most relevant stories from India which is currently one of the hottest investment destinations, but also has compelling stories that play into the Bloomberg's priority issues such as Climate change, Diversity and Technological innovation.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
channel.desc: A spotlight on the fast paced growth and major deals happening across the Middle East and Africa, linking the market drivers from overnight in the U.S. and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep-dive analysis of the top businesses.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
channel.desc: From London, essential morning viewing to stay ahead of the day's market trends with news stories from the U.S. and Asia in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg The Opening Trade
channel.desc: "The Opening Trade" explores things to know as markets open across Europe; analysis that isn't available anywhere else, a break down of the biggest stories of the day and top guests who have skin in the game.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
channel.desc: Based in London, Francine Lacqua speaks with guests about global business, economics, finance and politics.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Brief
channel.desc: "Bloomberg Brief" delivers the market news, data and analysis viewers need to set their agendas.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Surveillance
channel.desc: Jonathan, Lisa and Annmarie survey the economy and global markets with daily conversations with leaders and decision makers, from Wall Street to Washington and beyond, to cover the latest in business, investment and geopolitics.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Open Interest
channel.desc: Delivering the market-moving news anyone needs to know to get a jump start on the U.S. trading day.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Tech
channel.desc: Bloomberg Tech is the only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories. The program brings the audience interviews from the biggest names in the business, offering in-depth analysis and critical insights.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Technology
channel.desc: Technology is not only becoming an increasingly important part of people's lives but also of the American economy. "Bloomberg Technology" takes a look at how the latest happenings in the tech industry are affecting the U.S. markets. Analysis, commentary, interviews and interactive graphics are among the staples of the show that help viewers understand the impact the technology sector has on the economy. The show, which was originally titled "Bloomberg West," is anchored by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Real Yield
channel.desc: Not everyone has a lot of money to invest, which is why Bloomberg has financial indices that are based on fixed income, which is also the focus on this weekly show. The program covers news and trends in the fixed-income market and includes interviews with guests from major financial institutions. "Bloomberg Real Yield" incorporates data and analysis from terminal bond experts to help dive into topics that are moving the bond markets in order to help empower viewers to make knowledgeable financial decisions.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
channel.desc: Financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein talks with his peers - leaders of some of America's biggest companies - in this interview show that aims to answer the question of what makes a great leader; Rubenstein uses his chats to explore successful leadership skills through the personal and professional choices made by the business world's most influential people; Rubenstein travels across the country to find out about the business leaders' stories and uncover information about their paths to success; the interview subjects include Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, Berkshire Hathaway chairman Warren Buffett and Pepsi CEO Indra Nooyi.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Hello World
channel.desc: Business journalist Ashlee Vance hosts this series that explores how technology is shaping the future. Each episode focuses on a different country, exploring ways in which the local culture and geography influence the nation's approach to technology. Vance searches for the inventors and scientists behind the innovations to see how they are changing the future. On his journey, Vance finds fresh - and sometimes weird - tech creations, including robot exoskeletons and virtual reality characters in New Zealand.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
channel.desc: In an effort to provide extensive coverage of worldwide financial markets, Bloomberg features several regional shows under the "Bloomberg Markets" banner, with each focusing on that geographic area's markets. This Asian-focused version is hosted by Shery Ahn, David Ingles, Haidi Lun, Rishaad Salamat and Angie Lau. They report the latest business news and speak with the likes of political and business leaders to help investors make investment decisions that build their portfolios.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
channel.desc: From London, essential morning viewing to stay ahead of the day's market trends with news stories from the U.S. and Asia in the lead-up to the opening of European markets.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg The Opening Trade
channel.desc: "The Opening Trade" explores things to know as markets open across Europe; analysis that isn't available anywhere else, a break down of the biggest stories of the day and top guests who have skin in the game.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
channel.desc: Based in London, Francine Lacqua speaks with guests about global business, economics, finance and politics.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Brief
channel.desc: "Bloomberg Brief" delivers the market news, data and analysis viewers need to set their agendas.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Surveillance
channel.desc: Jonathan, Lisa and Annmarie survey the economy and global markets with daily conversations with leaders and decision makers, from Wall Street to Washington and beyond, to cover the latest in business, investment and geopolitics.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Open Interest
channel.desc: Delivering the market-moving news anyone needs to know to get a jump start on the U.S. trading day.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Technology
channel.desc: Technology is not only becoming an increasingly important part of people's lives but also of the American economy. "Bloomberg Technology" takes a look at how the latest happenings in the tech industry are affecting the U.S. markets. Analysis, commentary, interviews and interactive graphics are among the staples of the show that help viewers understand the impact the technology sector has on the economy. The show, which was originally titled "Bloomberg West," is anchored by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg ETF IQ
channel.desc: Bloomberg's Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Eric Balchunas are joined by leaders in the market, providing critical intelligence to finance advisers and investors of ETFs.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Markets
channel.desc: The most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
channel.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg Businessweek
channel.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the worlds of business and finance and the interesting stories of global technology, politics, economics and more.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: The Close
channel.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell; a synthesis of the top stories; key insights from investors, strategists and the companies of today and tomorrow.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
channel.desc: Focusing on the intersection of politics and global business.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Power Players
channel.desc: Sports personalities share their perspectives and discuss various subjects like the ever-evolving world of business, diversity in elite competitions and the rise of eSports.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
channel.desc: Bringing global investors everything you need to know as the trading day begins in Asia. Bloomberg TV is live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders.
